review: This works very well on any of the numerous sites that support it. Unfortunately Amazon Instant Video has taken the decision to snub the Chromecast which doesn't reflect very well on Amazon. I assume they just want to sell their Fire TV box, but instead I will probably let my Prime member ship lapse especially with the forthcoming price increase.The Chromecast is great because it sits behind the TV out of sight. It gets its power from the TV (USB port) and so it doesn't consume any power when the TV is off. It is easy to control from my iPad or my PC so that I can multitask. Great tool.

review: Great for streaming movies and tv shows! I would recommend it to those who like to watch movies with the family since it is easy to use and makes it easy to stream Netflix, youtube, and other services! If you want to stream local content all you have to do is use programs like Plex which allows you to upload local movies and play it straight to your Chromecast which is useful if you have family videos and such!
